name: PCKG_HIERARCHY_TRIAL
body_snippet:
package pckg_hierarchy_trial is

  -- Author  : Tariq Sarwar
  -- Created : 6/1/2004 4:16:23 PM
  -- Purpose : hierarchy trial
  
       TYPE REC_COLSET IS RECORD(COLUMN_ID NUMBER,COL_SEQ_NO NUMBER(5),POSITION NUMBER(5),CALCULATED_YN NUMBER(1),period_id number(15),from_query_no varchar2(50),activity_type varchar2(10),COL_DESC VARCHAR2(50),FORMAT_MASK VARCHAR2(50));
       type TAB_COLSET IS TABLE OF REC_COLSET INDEX BY BINARY_INTEGER;
       
       LTAB_COLSET TAB_COLSET;
       
       LTAB_COLSET_OUTPUT TAB_COLSET;
    
      PROCEDURE  POPULATE_HIERARCHY_TRIAL_P(PARM_SET_OF_BOOK NUMBER ,
                                          PARM_CODE_CRITERIA LONG,
                                          PARM_COLSET_ID     NUMBER,
                                          PARM_PERIOD_OF_INTEREST NUMBER,
                                          PARM_FROM_DATE DATE,
                                          PARM_TO_DATE DATE,
                                          include_zero NUMBER,
                                          included_segments VARCHAR2,
                                          hierarchy_on_segment varchar2,
                                          parm_include_adjusment number DEFAULT 0
                                          ) 
;    
       PROCEDURE  POPULATE_HIERARCHY_TRIAL(PARM_SET_OF_BOOK NUMBER ,
                                          PARM_CODE_CRITERIA LONG,
                                          PARM_CRNCY VARCHAR2 DEFAULT 'M',
